command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FfdjCLoumdFxBM.root --database CnvwHcg9Gg9M7uweMepDrE --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE machines;
messages: `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
stdout:
Table	Create Table
machines	CREATE TABLE `machines` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `serialNumber` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `model` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `location` text NOT NULL,
  `latitude` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `longitude` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('online','offline','maintenance') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'offline',
  `lastMaintenance` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `nextServiceDue` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `machines_serialNumber_unique` (`serialNumber`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin
